body.name: MELOGAGA Computer Speakers, 2.0 Stereo Mini Desktop Speaker, USB Powered & 3.5mm Aux-in PC Gaming Speakers with in-line Volume Control, Plug and Play for Desktop, Laptops, Monitor

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Mini RGB PC Speakers （With USB-C Adapter）

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 16 mins
features: 【HiFi 2.0 Stereo Sound】 Equipped with 2*3W full range speakers and unique inverted hole design, enhanced stereo core, and extended low frequency lower limit, ML005 brings you the perfect auditory enjoyment.
【Compact Design Minimalist Style】 The speaker shell is made of high-quality ABS material, smooth and upscale textural feel. 2.75*2.44*3.30inch small fuselage is ideal for desks with limited space.
【Easy-access Volume Control】 It's easy to control the volume up and volume down by the in-line wheel button, convenient and accurate.
【Plug & Play for Broad Compatibility】 USB powered and 3.5mm aux-in allows this speaker works with most devices such as PC, desktop computer, Laptop, tablet, and cellphone.

【After-sale Support】 ML005 computer speakers backed by MELOGAGA 18-month limited warranty. Note: If using a power adapter to supply power, the current of the power adapter must meet 5V/1A, do not use the fast charger to power it.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 161 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use the speaker? （1）Plug the 3.5mm audio cable and USB cable in your computer （2）And the speaker is plug and play, just to adjust the volume of the speaker and the PC to use it. *If still with no sound in the speaker, please operate on the computer： （1）Click the Speaker icon in the taskbar. （2）Select this speaker as your computer playback device. Q & A Q: The sound is not loud, how to do it? A: The speaker's volume control is independent of the PC. You can click the PC volume icon to adjust the volume of PC to the highest, and then long press the speaker's volume button to adjust the volume to a suitable level. Q: Is a tweeter at the top of each speaker? A: No, it isn't. It's a decorate dome for the inverted hole at the back of the speaker, and the inverted hole help to enhanced stereo core, and extended low frequency lower limit. The computer speakers equip with two full-range speaker, bring you the perfect auditory enjoyment. Q: What’s the length of the cables? A: The speakers to the volume controller: 45cm / 17in; The USB plug/3.5mm jack to the in-line volume controller: 75cm / 30in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just What I Wanted. Cute, Small and Functional.
reviews.reviewText: My old surround sound computer speaker set up died. I really just wanted something smaller, with less cords this time. No need for a concert in my living room, mainly just to watch videos and listen to things online like we all do. Something without spending much. I saw these and thought they were super cute, small and easy to install though I did have to play around with the different plugs for my desktop. They sound great for what I wanted. I just keep glancing at them as I worked from home today and I had to come leave a review. They make me smile and we all need that right now! Small things to be thankful for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for laptops
reviews.reviewText: The speakers work great for laptop and give surprisingly good quality sound for size and price. They are aesthetic and fit nice on my desk. Pros: Good sound quality / fits well on desk. Cons: You can hear the idiots on conference calls clearly now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the changing colors on them and the quality is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 pairs of these for Halloween props and they are perfectly sized and audible for this, but 2 of the 3 pairs stppoed worked after 2 nights. Both units were in trunks and not in the elements...all audio files were passed through audacy to eliminate clipping. the small amplifier in the cord quit. I was able to cut them up after and use the 3w speakers on a separate small amp, but they are not terribly robust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small speakers for many uses.
reviews.reviewText: Great sound and a great price. Well made. Super simple to install on your laptop or desktop. Will even work very well on a TV without having to finagle with your TV's remote to recognize them. I'm probably going to buy an additional pair of them, I like them that well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MELOGAGA Computer Speakers
reviews.reviewText: Great replacement for my Amazon Basics speakers. These are 3.0 W per speaker whereas the others were only 1.2 W. They were pretty loud but naturally these are even louder. I plug them into the back of my smart TV. So much better than the Phission mini speakers which claim to be 3.0 W but were not loud at all!What a joke they were. These speakers are TERRIFIC, I like them a LOT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordability and USB convenience - but mediocre sound quality.
reviews.reviewText: The Computer Speakers for Desktop, USB Powered PC Speaker, is a mixed bag, but it has its merits. Let's start with the not-so-great aspects – the sound quality is mediocre. It won't blow you away, and if you're an audiophile, you might find it lacking.However, the redeeming qualities come from its practicality. The ability to power it directly from a USB port on the computer is a game-changer. No need for additional power outlets or cords – it's a convenient solution for those looking to declutter their workspace.Considering the price point, it's a reasonable compromise. While it might not deliver the highest audio fidelity, the affordability and USB power option make it a solid choice for those on a budget or with minimal desk space.If you prioritize budget and ease of use over top-notch audio, these speakers are worth considering for your desktop setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Worth the money . Amplified the volume to the computer speakers . Great purchase 👍🏾
